title: How to write a letter to discontinue college because of a job - Quora

response.answer_text: You can write as under: Quote Principal,_______________. Respected Sir, I am a student of your College studying ____________ under Roll No. __________. Due to bad financial condition at home, I am compelled to take up a job to support myself and my family. Under these circumstances, I will not be able to continue attending College. May I request you Sir to kindly accept my request and allow me to discontinue studies now. I would request you to issue a certificate to this effect so that at a later date, I am in a position to continue the studies from where I left now. Looking forward to your kind help, Sir, Thanking you, Yours respectfully, TANISHKA Sharma
